timeline.bodyText: Are you sure this path prefix works? I don't believe DevOps allows such syntax so I'd suggest you validate it.
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,9 +13,7 @@ trigger:
       - release/*
   paths:
     include:
-      - sdk/vmwarecloudsimple/
-    exclude:
-      - sdk/vmwarecloudsimple/microsoft-azure
+      - sdk/vmwarecloudsimple/mgmt-

replies.bodyText: The matching logic for pipelines is effectively a starts-with check. So if your folkders start with sdk/vmwareclouresimple/mgmt- it should match (and in this case exclude) them.
replies.author: mitchdenny

replies.bodyText: ... you just can't/don't need the wildcard symbols like * etc.
replies.author: mitchdenny

replies.bodyText:
@weshaggard @mitchdenny
I've tried part of path in my own repo. It indeed does not work.
I set the "include" to "src/ma", not work, "src/main", works.
I will revert it back to "include" + "exclude" setting. Even if "exclude" part not working correctly, it still be better compared to "include" part not working.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.message: revert back to include + exclude setting. exclude contains common pattern used by client/data, though it might not work.
